page.title: Rigel, Merck Form Development Partnership
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Biotechnology company Rigel Pharmaceuticals Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=RIGL.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">RIGL.O</A> has entered into a collaboration pact with drugmaker Merck Co. Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MRK.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MRK.N</A> to find treatments for cancer and potentially other diseases, Rigel said on Monday.
